Without access to the page I canâ€™t inspect what value/data is in your setup.

Can you call information from a field in one module in another?

`{% module %}` is disabled in the module editor/design manager so the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context|export_to_template> solution doesn't work. I'd like to take the value from another module "choice" field and use it in a different one. Is this possible?
